sourcesContent: import { Component, EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; import { Post } from 'src/app/interfaces/posts.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-post-create', templateUrl: './post-create.component.html', styleUrls: ['./post-create.component.scss'] }) export class PostCreateComponent { newPost = new EventEmitter(); post: Post = { _id: Math.random().toString(), title: "", content: "" } onCreatePost(){ console.log("title", this.post.title); console.log("title", this.post.content); this.newPost.emit(this.post); } }
